name: @vlsergey/react-bootstrap-pagination
description: Ready-to-use wrapper for react-bootstrap Pagation component

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel -d lib src && flow-copy-source -v src lib
scripts.eslint:check: eslint --ignore-pattern "!.eslintrc.js" .eslintrc.js babel.config.js karma.conf.js flow-typed/*.js src/**/*.js test/**/*.js
scripts.eslint:fix: eslint --ignore-pattern "!.eslintrc.js" --fix .eslintrc.js babel.config.js karma.conf.js flow-typed/*.js src/**/*.js test/**/*.js
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BROWSERSLIST="current node" karma start karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BROWSERSLIST="current node" karma start karma.conf.js --no-single-run
scripts.test:watch:chrome: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BROWSERSLIST="last 2 Chrome versions" karma start karma.conf.js --no-single-run --browsers Chrome
scripts.preversion: npm run eslint:fix && npm run flow:check && npm run test && npm run build

author: Sergey Vladimirov <vlsergey@gmail.com>
